entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 15 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing before morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NDT Monday 3 April 2023
